self.geo['throat.area'] = 1.0
self.geo.add_model(propname='throat.diameter', model=gm.throat_size.
    equivalent_diameter, throat_area='throat.area', throat_shape='circle')
a = np.unique(self.geo['throat.diameter'])
b = np.array(1.12837917, ndmin=1)
assert np.allclose(a, b)
del self.geo['throat.diameter'], self.geo.models['throat.diameter']
self.geo.add_model(propname='throat.diameter', model=gm.throat_size.
    equivalent_diameter, throat_area='throat.area', throat_shape='square')
a = np.unique(self.geo['throat.diameter'])
b = np.array(1.0, ndmin=1)
assert np.allclose(a, b)
del self.geo['throat.diameter'], self.geo.models['throat.diameter']
